Articles.Content: I made a simple craft to test heatshields on the ground. The problem is that the engine does not heat the heat shield. After a few seconds the capsule explodes. ![usTQWjf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/usTQWjf.jpg)

Dude, nice rig haha, I never thought of doing anything like that

I wonder what jeb is thinking when he straps into contraptions like these.
The engine is probably to far away form the heatshield. Try it closer.

> 
> The engine is probably to far away form the heatshield. Try it closer.

I have tried different distances. Engine ignores the shield and heats the next part.
I believe the heatshield is programmed to deal with the atmospheric heating only, and not from other sources ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
